mapper.select:
select t.rwid, t.yzmc, t.yzjl, t.uploadpath, t.yzrdm, t.bz, to_char(t.yzsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MM:SS') yzsj from znsjcl_yj_sjyz t where t.lxid = '1' and t.dyyw = '数据研究' and t.yxbz = 'Y'
and t.yzmc like '%${svo.yzmc}%'
order by yzsj desc
mapper.update: UPDATE znsjcl_yj_sjyz t SET t.yxbz = 'N' where t.rwid = '${svo.rwid}'
mapper.insert: insert into znsjcl_yj_sjyz (rwid, yzmc, yzjl, uploadpath, dyyw, yxbz, yzsj ,lxid) values (SJDX_INDEX.NEXTVAL, '${svo.yzmc}', '${svo.yzjl}', '${svo.uploadpath}', '数据研究', 'Y', sysdate, '1')
